name: Resident Evil Consternation Fangame
description:
Fangame Resident Evil Consternation

You play as a Kevin Ryman, R.P.D. officer, who decided to stay at Raccoon City for one more night and help the others with citywide evacuation. But from the beginning of the game, Raccoon City outbreak events take an unpredictable route to an unexpected ending.

 

! Mouse and keyboard required to play the game !

The game is made in the form of 2D adventure and offers:

- Original storyline within the lore of the series;

- A visual inspired by PC-98 videogames;

- Classic Resident Evil gameplay with exploring locations, solving puzzles and killing mutated enemies;

-  Just like in Resident Evil Outbreak games, you need to keep track of the both Health and Infection indicators simultaneously.

 

It is recommended:

- to play the game in the dark and with headphones for maximum atmosphere;

- to save often at different save slots;

 

Resident Evil Consternation is free fan-made game of Resident Evil series. This game is for personal use only, not for sale or redistribution. All rights to the Resident Evil trademarks belong to CAPCOM company.
